original_text: When Jacob heard that his daughter Dinah had been defiled, his sons were in the fields with his livestock; so he did nothing about it until they came home.
korean_text: 야곱이 그 딸 디나를 그가 더럽혔다 함을 들었으나 자기의 아들들이 들에서 목축하므로 그들이 돌아오기까지 잠잠하였고

sentences.original_text: that his daughter Dinah had been defiled
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 딸 디나가 더럽힘을 당했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: his sons were in the fields
so he did nothing about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그에 대해 아무것도 하지 않았다
